alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Hansford; Hutchinson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 3:38PM CST until February 21 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Armstrong, Carson, Hansford, and Hutchinson Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy to areas of blowing dust may reduce visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
